April 7, 2018 D North American Championships (Second Section)
North American Championships (Second Section) 20 Set Test and Own Choice North American Championships north-american-championships-2nd-section
United States of America
Second
Frontier Visions
Grand Wayne Convention Centre (Anthony Wayne Ballroom), Fort Wayne, Indiana, USA 2.15-6.45 pm
The overall score is weighted as 60% test piece, 40% remainder of program. First tiebreaker: The band with the highest test piece scores wins. Second tiebreaker: The band rated higher on the test piece by 2 of the 3 judges wins.
Feb. 17, 2018, 9:29 a.m. April 11, 2018, 8:47 p.m.
